item.description:
If possible, please bring 5 photocopies of whatever you are currently studying (for instance, grammar, vocabulary list, a short reading, etc.), index cards, and a small notebook to use as a journal.

I have put some directions, maps, and information of the class on my website:
http://www.accidental...
item.how_to_find_us: The Stata center may not be open at 6:30, but there are generally students walking in and out, so you should be able to get in. If not, the gym door may be open. I will likely secure some tables in the cafe area.
item.why: You'll have a chance to work towards your own language goals.
item.name: Japanese and English Study Night
